name: Infocom EasyFlash Collection V3.1
overview: A collector's Easyflash release for the C64 and C64C. Enjoy all the adventuring without all the disk swapping. Contains these classic Infocom text adventure games in fast and convenient cartridge format: • Zork I • Zork II • Zork III • Enchanter • Sorcerer • Spellbreaker • Deadline • Witness • Suspect
